sentences.english: I believe our country is not bad already but this is only under currect situation.
sentences.chinese: 我相信我们的国家还不错，但这只是根据现况。

sentences.english: These people are all conformists ; they won't change anything.
sentences.chinese: 这些人都是遵奉传统者，他们无法对现况作任何改变。

sentences.english: Analysis of the present scheme of the educational training, 4.
sentences.chinese: 分析不同加盟业种下之教育训练制度现况。

sentences.english: Objective To study the poor eyesight situation of the students in the Xininng town and countryside.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解广东省兴宁市城乡中小学生视力不良现况。

sentences.english: This Forum is centred on the theme of co-operation between public and private housing and their prospect for the future.
sentences.chinese: 此论坛取题于公营与私营房屋合作的现况和开拓前景。

sentences.english: Methods Cross-sectional study and case-control study were performed.
sentences.chinese: 方法现况调查和病例对照研究。

sentences.english: The accounting department is required to submit weekly status reports to our general manager.
sentences.chinese: 会计部必须每周向总经理提出现况报告。

sentences.english: For the current development of Penghu (Pescadores), promoting tourism is a common concern.
sentences.chinese: 对于澎湖现况发展而言，发展观光是一致的共识。

sentences.english: To investigate the smoking situation and influencing factors of some technical secondary schoolboys in Hengshui city.
sentences.chinese: 了解衡水市中专在校男生的吸烟现况及其影响因素。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the current status of endemic fluorosis in Yangyuan County.
sentences.chinese: 目的掌握河北省阳原县地方性氟中毒流行现况。

sentences.english: Catch the present condition how the marketing strategy is conducted among those artist villages.
sentences.chinese: 了解台湾艺术村实施行销策略之现况。

sentences.english: First, the present situation of information technology integrated in teaching in Changhua County leaned toward positive.
sentences.chinese: 彰化县国中教师资讯科技融入教学现况偏向正向。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the prevalence and associated risk factors of back pain in pilots.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解飞行员腰背痛的现况及危险因素。

sentences.english: Based on current situations, the state made modifications to the conscription law.
sentences.chinese: 根据现况，国家对兵役法进行了调整。

sentences.english: Review of Current Uses of Anchors and Reinforced Soil Walls in …
sentences.chinese: 国内既有钢筋混凝土结构物补强之现况检讨。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the epidemiological status of soil-transmitted parasites in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解湖南省土源性寄生虫感染现况。

definition: variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
(Tw) to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
to respond accordingly to/to adapt to/to cope with
